name: computable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If the answer to a mathematical problem is computable, you can calculate it by using a machine: The amount of heat produced by the process is easily computable. In theory, it is possible to express any computable function in one line of code.
More examplesFewer examplesUnfortunately, the answer to this question is not computable.He was trying to design a single machine that could be used to calculate any computable sequence.The precise amount that she owed was probably not computable.
